body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#24859](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24859) (wallet: Change wallet validation order by w0xlt)
* [#24845](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24845) (wallet: createTransaction, return proper error description for  "too-long-mempool-chain" + introduce generic Result classes by furszy)
* [#24644](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24644) (wallet: add tracepoints and algorithm information to coin selection by achow101)
* [#24149](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24149) (Signing support for Miniscript Descriptors by darosior)
* [#24148](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24148) (Miniscript support in Output Descriptors by darosior)
* [#23417](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23417) (wallet, spkm: Move key management from DescriptorScriptPubKeyMan to wallet level KeyManager by achow101)
* [#22693](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22693) (RPC/Wallet: Add "use_txids" to output of getaddressinfo by luke-jr)
* [#22341](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22341) (rpc: add getxpub by Sjors)
* [#21928](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21928) (wallet: allow toggling external_signer flag by Sjors)
* [#21702](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21702) (Implement BIP-119 Validation (CheckTemplateVerify) by JeremyRubin)
* [#20640](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20640) (wallet, refactor: return out-params of CreateTransaction() as optional struct by theStack)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
